nwb_version._description: File versino string, with major, minor and patch numbers -- eg, NWB-0.5.01

identifier._description: A unique text identifier for the file

session_description._description: One or two sentences providing high level description of the data contained in the file

file_create_date._description: Date and time file was created, UTC (ISO 8601)

modification_time._description: Array storing all subsequent modification dates

session_start_time._description: Date and time experimetn was started, UTC (ISO 8601).   This serves as the reference time for data in the file. All timestamps are to be stored as seconds after this reference time

images._description: Documentation images/movies of experiment, surgery, setup, etc

description._description: Textual description of the stored data

format._description: Format of stored data, eg, avi, tiff, etc

timeseries._description: One or more TimeSeries objects storing acquisition data

stimulus._description: Data pushed into the system, including derived representations of that data

templates._description: Zero or more templates of stimuli (time series). Templates may be presented multiple times but only need to be stored once

presentations._description: Zero or more time series of presented stimuli
